General.Name: Phuoc Hoa Rubber JSC
General.Description: Phuoc Hoa Rubber Joint Stock Company plants, processes, and trades in rubber and rubber wood in Vietnam. It operates through Rubber Products, Wood Processing, Other Product and Services segment. The company is involved in the plantation of rubber trees; processing of rubber wood and latex; harvesting of timber from planted forests; cultivation service activities; exploiting and processing of rubber caps; wholesale of fertilizer, chemical, blind rubber, and rubber wood; and retail of petroleum. It also engages in the business of financial investment; industrial and civil engineering construction work; real estate business; investment in infrastructure of industrial parks, residential areas, and commercial zones; construction and repair of road works; and commodity import and export of entrustment services. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Tan Thanh, Vietnam.
